title: Uniform Makers UniFirst, Cintas Renew Takeover Talks
description: UniFirst Corp. is now in active discussions to be acquired by Cintas Corp., people familiar with the matter said, after years of on and off attempts at a potential deal.
content: UniFirst Corp. is now in active discussions to be acquired by Cintas Corp., people familiar with the matter said, after years of on and off attempts at a potential deal.
